_comment: JIRA backend configuration - Contains API metadata and technical settings. Organization workflow policies (transitions, parent_field_mapping) are now in organization.json.
_field_mappings_comment: Auto-discovered on first use via 'daf config refresh-jira-fields'. You can manually set field IDs if needed. Example: {'acceptance_criteria': {'id': 'customfield_12345', 'required_for': ['Story', 'Epic']}}
_migration_note: MIGRATION: If you have 'transitions' or 'parent_field_mapping' in this file from a previous version, move them to organization.json
